title: Study of the correlation between the magnetic and electrical properties of the La0.6Sr0.4MnO3 compound
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21692-21705
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03528C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
H. Gharsallah, M. Jeddi, M. Bejar, E. Dhahri, S. Nouari
In this work, we investigated the relationship between the electrical and magnetic properties of the superparamagnetic (SPM) La0.6Sr0.4MnO3 (S1C0) compound prepared by the sol–gel method.
